name: Flappy Glitch
description:
Flappy Glitch is an awesome glitchy version of the famous... well, you know what game we are talking about!!

Here's what said a Laptop about this game:
"STOP Error 0x00000001 to STOP Error 0x0000005F
MANUALLY_INITIATED_CRASH1
MANUALLY_INITIATED_CRASH1
MANUALLY_INITIATED_CRASH1
This is not what you are used to. Press a key to Continue."

So have fun! :D
*Disclaimer: the glitches in this game are NOT REAL, your phone is working perfectly.*
